title: AD-AS Graph - Leftward shift in AD caused by ...

content.question: The graph above shows two aggregate demand curves, AD1 and AD2, and an aggregate supply curve, AS. The shift in the aggregate demand curve from AD1 to AD2 could be caused by

choices.label: a decrease in the money supply
an increase in the price level

content.answer: a decrease in the money supply

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
